item.description: “I felt that the time of ‘change’ had come, and I needed to go and shoot” ( Flashbak , 2018). To start: explore Igor Mukhin’s work in the series Смотри в тишине (Look in silence). Presented by MAMM (= Multimedia Art Museum, Moscow).

item.title: Photo: Aleksey Myakishev
item.description: Kolodozero The photographer did something similar (between 2011 and 2015) in Kolodozero (Колодозеро), a village in Karelia where in winter you’re more likely to see snow than people. Images from the series can be seen on Photoshelter and Viewbook , with slides and commentary on Vimeo (1 min).
